attributes.action: Bestow A Knighthood on Messrs Henry Allingham and Harry Patch WW I Veterans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the remaining two WWI veterans are deserving of a Knighthood. 

It is the least that this country can do to recognise the sacrifices made.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
